snippet.title: S.W.I.N.E. HD Remaster Announcement trailer 2019
snippet.description: Experience again the nifty war strategy game that defined the childhood of many players in the golden age of gaming. Nearly 18 years later, Kite Games, in cooperation with the original developers and some enthusiastic fans, redesigned the game in HD and reignited the original S.W.I.N.E. warfare feeling. In this unique, real-time strategy game, the player chooses to lead to victory either the brutal pigs or the peace-loving rabbits.
